text: Of course Bill Gates is a nasty fuck. Come on. All you had to do was read my blog. Even so, I actually like Bill Gates. It's weird. I've met with him a few times and always found it interesting and memorable. At one time believe it or not I wanted to work at Microsoft. Friends later told me I dodged a bullet. Actually a couple of times. Anyway the reporters are going for him now. Time to get out the popcorn.
